Method(s)/Technology(ies): Diluted Russell's viper venom clotting assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HemosIL dRVVT Screen and dRVVT Confirm qualitative assays for detecting lupus anticoagulant in citrated plasma using the diluted Russell's viper venom method.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in-vitro assays aiding in detection of lupus anticoagulants in human citrated plasma for patients with unexplained prolonged APTT, to be used in parallel as an integrated test on the ACL TOP Family.
